code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useCart}from"../context/CartContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{getTotalItems}=useCart();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"sticky top-0 z-50 bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-700 to-orange-500 shadow-md text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4 py-3 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-2xl font-bold tracking-wide",children:"\uD83C\uDF7D\uFE0F Foodie"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"space-x-6 font-medium",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"hover:text-yellow-200 transition",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/menu",className:"hover:text-yellow-200 transition",children:"Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"relative hover:text-yellow-200 transition",children:["\uD83D\uDED2",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute -top-2 -right-3 bg-red-500 text-white text-xs w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full",children:getTotalItems()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"hover:text-yellow-200 transition",children:"Login"})]})]})});};export default Header;
